name: obsidian-unified-question-handler
description: A plugin that provides a unified interface for handling multiple questions in Obsidian note creation workflows.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run version && git commit -am "Release v$npm_package_version" && git tag -a "$npm_package_version" -m "$npm_package_version" && git push && git push --tags
